name: Client Services
description: Client Services is the first-stop for families seeking Homeless Prenatal Program (HPP) support, with services ranging from: - Emergency Support: Access to food, clothes, diapers and other baby needs, as well as support to enter emergency shelter - Case management - Referral services: Guided support to access the right services and providers. - Crisis Management: Support to overcome urgent challenges. howToGetIt: Please fill out the online Client Services Interest Form to receive critical support, assessment and referral services if you are a new or existing client. Though we strive to reach everyone in a timely manner, please note that we are experiencing a very high volume of requests for services. Client Services Interest Form: https://www.homelessprenatal.org/client-services-interest
